description: HTML source code for a web-based database visualizer interface, including UI layout, styles, and client-side scripting for fetching and displaying database information and data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the server and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database item to show tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders fetched data into an HTML table.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual cell content, handling long text and objects.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Enlarges or reduces the content of a cell on click, used for long text or objects.
